title: Does eternity before eternity exist? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is logically impossible. It’s the same as someone saying “almost infinite.” If something is eternal, truly eternal, then it has no beginning and no end. You couldn’t get to a time before eternity to find an eternity there. Imagine it this way. You have a barrel with an infinite number of marbles in it. How long would it take you to get to the bottom of the barrel? You couldn’t ever get to the bottom of it, so there couldn’t be anything “beyond” it. Do the same thing going the other way, and you’ve got eternity. One more example. Imagine today, March 23, 2019, is 0 on a number line. The time before eternity would lie beyond the negatives on the number line. The time beyond eternity would lie beyond the positive on the number line. You couldn’t ever get beyond either end, so no eternity before or after eternity.
That is smartest question l have ever come across….. unable to even comprehend the wisdom therein.
